title: Simulation-Based Training for Postpartum Hemorrhage (PPH) Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational obstetrics concepts
context.additional_context: Education for language domain majors to cultivate PPH (Post-Partum Hemorrhage) management protocols and situational awareness through medical simulation-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the first-line response procedures for PPH (e.g., administration of uterotonics, compression hemostasis) within three steps.
Learners can collaborate with team members to apply PPH patient management protocols within 15 minutes in a simulation scenario.
Through self-assessment after debriefing, learners can identify three or more error factors in PPH management and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
